template.name: Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2
template.description:
Template Server HP iLO version: 0.13 Overview: for HP iLO adapters that support SNMP get. Or via operating system, using SNMP HP subagent
MIBs used: CPQHLTH-MIB CPQSINFO-MIB CPQIDA-MIB

item.name: System: Temperature status
item.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB This value specifies the overall condition of the system's thermal environment. This value will be one of the following: other(1) Temperature could not be determined. ok(2) The temperature sensor is within normal operating range. degraded(3) The temperature sensor is outside of normal operating range. failed(4) The temperature sensor detects a condition that could permanently damage the system.

item.name: Общий статус системы
item.description: MIB: CPQSINFO-MIB The overall condition. This object represents the overall status of the server information represented by this MIB.

item.name: Модель
item.description: MIB: CPQSINFO-MIB The machine product name.The name of the machine used in this system.

item.name: Серийный номер
item.description: MIB: CPQSINFO-MIB The serial number of the physical system unit. The string will be empty if the system does not report the serial number function.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: {#SNMPINDEX}

item_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature sensor location
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB This specifies the location of the temperature sensor present in the system.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"{#SNMPINDEX}"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"{#SNMPINDEX}"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPINDEX}: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"{#SNMPINDEX}"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery Ambient
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable with ambient(11) and 0.1 index filter

item_prototype.name: Ambient: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: Ambient

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Ambient: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"Ambient"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery CPU
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable with cpu(6) filter

item_prototype.name: CPU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: CPU-{#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.name: CPU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: CPU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: CPU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery Memory
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable with memory(7) filter

item_prototype.name: Memory-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: Memory-{#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.name: Memory-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Memory"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Memory-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Memory"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: Memory-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"Memory"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery PSU
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable with powerSupply(10) filter

item_prototype.name: PSU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: PSU-{#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.name: PSU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"PSU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: PSU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"PSU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: PSU-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"PSU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery I/O
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable with ioBoard(5) filter

item_prototype.name: I/O-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: I/O-{#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.name: I/O-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"I/O"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: I/O-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"I/O"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: I/O-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"I/O"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Discovery System
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Temperature Sensor Entries: CPQHLTH-MIB::cpqHeTemperatureTable with system(3) filter

item_prototype.name: System-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB Temperature readings of testpoint: System-{#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.name: System-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"Device"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: System-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"Device"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: System-{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура слишком низкая: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"Device"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}.

item_prototype.name: Chassis {#CHASSIS_NUM}, bay {#BAY_NUM}: Статус блока питания
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB The condition of the power supply. This value will be one of the following: other(1) The status could not be determined or not present. ok(2) The power supply is operating normally. degraded(3) A temperature sensor, fan or other power supply component is outside of normal operating range. failed(4) A power supply component detects a condition that could permanently damage the system.

trigger_prototype.name: Chassis {#CHASSIS_NUM}, bay {#BAY_NUM}: Статус блока питания: авария
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте блок питания

trigger_prototype.name: Chassis {#CHASSIS_NUM}, bay {#BAY_NUM}: Статус блока питания: предупреждение
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте блок питания

dependency.name: Chassis {#CHASSIS_NUM}, bay {#BAY_NUM}: Статус блока питания: авария

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: Статус вентилятора
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQHLTH-MIB The condition of the fan. This value will be one of the following: other(1) Fan status detection is not supported by this system or driver. ok(2) The fan is operating properly. degraded(2) A redundant fan is not operating properly. failed(4) A non-redundant fan is not operating properly.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: Статус вентилятора: сбой
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте вентилятор

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: Статус вентилятора: предупреждение
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте вентилятор

discovery_rule.name: Array Controller Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of Array controllers: CPQIDA-MIB::cpqDaCntlrTable

item_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_LOCATION}: Статус контроллера дискового массива
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQIDA-MIB This value represents the overall condition of this controller, and any associated logical drives,physical drives, and array accelerators.

item_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_LOCATION}: Модель контроллера дискового массива
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQIDA-MIB Array Controller Model. The type of controller card.

trigger_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_LOCATION}: Статус контроллера дискового массива: авария
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте устройство

trigger_prototype.name: {#CNTLR_LOCATION}: Статус контроллера дискового массива: предупреждение
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте устройство

discovery_rule.name: Physical Disk Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Scanning table of physical drive entries CPQIDA-MIB::cpqDaPhyDrvTable.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Статус физического диска
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQIDA-MIB Physical Drive Status. This shows the status of the physical drive. The following values are valid for the physical drive status: other (1) Indicates that the instrument agent does not recognize the drive. You may need to upgrade your instrument agent and/or driver software. ok (2) Indicates the drive is functioning properly. failed (3) Indicates that the drive is no longer operating and should be replaced. predictiveFailure(4) Indicates that the drive has a predictive failure error and should be replaced.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: S.M.A.R.T. статус диска
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQIDA-MIB Physical Drive S.M.A.R.T Status.The following values are defined: other(1) The agent is unable to determine if the status of S.M.A.R.T predictive failure monitoring for this drive. ok(2) Indicates the drive is functioning properly. replaceDrive(3) Indicates that the drive has a S.M.A.R.T predictive failure error and should be replaced.

item_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Серийный номер физического диска
item_prototype.description: MIB: CPQIDA-MIB Physical Drive Serial Number. This is the serial number assigned to the physical drive. This value is based upon the serial number as returned by the SCSI inquiry command but may have been modified due to space limitations. This can be used for identification purposes.

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Статус физического диска: сбой
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте диск

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Статус физического диска: предупреждение
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Проверьте диск

trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Статус S.M.A.R.T. физического диска: сбой
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Возможно требуется замена диска.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.serialnumber[cpqDaPhyDrvSerialNum.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1 and {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.hw.physicaldisk.serialnumber[cpqDaPhyDrvSerialNum.{#SNMPINDEX}].strlen()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#DISK_LOCATION}: Возможно замена устройства (получен новый серийный номер)
trigger_prototype.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Изменился серийный номер устройства. Подтвердите и закройте.

trigger.expression: {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Server HP iLO SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Возможно замена устройства (получен новый серийный номер)
trigger.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Изменился серийный номер устройства. Подтвердите и закройте.
